storyInfo: Allerdale Cumberland. You will meet Vina again, someday.

attributes.content: The sound of steam.
Heavy gushing.

attributes.text: 'Not bad, **. A Steam Knight at your age! You're our pride, and the pride of Victoria!'

attributes.content: Unintelligible syllables. Is someone calling his name?
But he cannot remember his own name anymore.
Evans? Jones? Wilson? Lynch?
None of them, and all of them.

attributes.text: 'We vow to defend Victoria unto our last breath.'

attributes.content: But why...
Why were his fellows hidden in the shadows behind the outlanders' swords?
His comrades fell, one by one.
In the end, he was the only one left. He was The Last Steam Knight.
He cannot fall here. The Steam Knights must not fall.
Victoria needs him. He must fulfill his duty.
No medicine, no matter. The armor will repair his flesh and blood.
No food, no matter. There are always critters crawling in the darkness.
No light, no matter. The sword gives him all the light he needs.
He is not dead. The Steam Knights are not dead. They continue to defend Victoria.
But...
What is Victoria?
I swore an oath before the King, before the people, before the world.
I stood vigil, night after night, but where lies the light of Victoria that I have sworn fealty to?
Is Victoria its king?
They hanged the king.
Is Victoria Parliament and the nobles?
No maintenance, no supplies, no new members. They sent the Steam Knights into mortal danger time after time, in order to feed their greed.
Is Victoria the people?

The people praise the Steam Knights, honor the Steam Knights, glorify the Steam Knights. They place all their hopes, all their dreams upon the Steam Knights. Nothing can carry hopes that are so contradictory, so complex.
What is Victoria?
Does Victoria only exist in the imagination?
There is still the sword, the Sighs of Kings.
It is the symbol of Victoria, beyond all doubt.
Then it will be his Victoria.
Now, someone wants to defile his Victoria.
This is unacceptable.
He cannot lose his last—
(Heavy gushing)
attributes.name: 'The Last Steam Knight'

attributes.content: 'Victoria.'
attributes.name: 'The Last Steam Knight'

attributes.content: D-Do you hear, knight?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: I cannot command you.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: I ask you to allow us to take the sword.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Not because of who I am.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Londinium needs it.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: No, not Londinium.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: The children shivering in orphanages need it. The farmers who lost hearth and home to war need it.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: The workers pouring sweat and blood into their machines need it. The citizens who drink away their helplessness need it.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: The soldiers who step forward to protect their homes need it. Rhodes Island, trying to avert disaster, needs it.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: It is not a storm that it will dispel. It is the fear.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: This is how it must be used.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: It's not your Victoria, knight.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Allow me to pass.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Not Victoria?
Then where is Victoria?
The Steam Knight is filled with confusion and anger.
Where is Victoria?!
What is the Victoria that he served?!
(Heavy gushing)
attributes.name: 'The Last Steam Knight'

attributes.content: He's getting faster!
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: We can't stop him!
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Allerdale!
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Your Highness Alexandrina.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: Do you remember the day we met?
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: We should have spoken more. You appeared at the ducal manor, with that sword.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: It was a beautiful afternoon.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: There was music in the garden. The flowers bloomed brightly. People danced and talked about tomorrow. Everything was filled with hope.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: I boasted that I would become a Steam Knight.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: The light shone upon the sword... and upon you.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: They said what happened that afternoon was a miracle.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: She was running.
The freshly-trimmed grass made her feet itch. Jim the Gardener laughed by the bushes. Ailshie ran after her, calling for her to slow down.
But she was eager to run towards the freshly-blooming flowers. They were golden, shining under the sun, like the emblem of House Cumberland.
Her father picked her up, sat her on his shoulder. She lifted her tiny palm, and let her touch the lines on the steam armor.
The broken armor stands up.
Her father is gone. She has grown up, and she no longer stands before the armor. She feels the heavy weight of the armor on her shoulder.
Through her visor, she sees a golden lion at the end of the path.

attributes.text: You will meet Vina again, someday.'

attributes.content: It's been hard for me to believe in miracles, after all these years.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: Ailshie told me that I don't know who I will be.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: I'm afraid there won't be a 'will be'.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: How old was I? I don't remember. I promised Ailshie that I'd become a Steam Knight and protect everyone.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: At least, I have the chance to face a Steam Knight now.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: I hear you, Vina. There's no such thing as fate or destiny.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: Not for House Cumberland, not for the dukes.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: To hell with destiny. I'm tired.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: Tired of playing a noble, playing a leader, playing a friend.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: You're the leader of the Self-Salvation Corps because they trust you.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: You're my friend because I say you are.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Hah. That's enough, Vina.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: Let's put an end to the fable.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: Tell Morgan to cast me in a better light in her memoir, Dagda.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: Use more refined words, at least.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: What's going on?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: The wind...
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: A gust of wind blows them outside.
One solemn face falls after another, as the statues of the kings collapse, one by one.
The rubble separates them from the Steam Knight... and someone else.
Siege immediately reacts.
Allerdale!
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Forgive me...
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: Her lips move slightly.
Siege knows Allerdale called to her.
Was it 'Vina'? Or 'Your Highness'?
Siege does not know.
She may never know.
The sound is drowned by the rubble.
The door is shut.
Alright, come now, my nightmare...
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: My hope.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: (Heavy gushing)
attributes.name: 'The Last Steam Knight'

attributes.content: One scene floats to the surface of the Steam Knight's tumultuous memories.
A girl sheds tears for him before he stands up.
Pah—
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Son of a—
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: There's nowhere to run!
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: Last smoke grenade. We still have a chance.
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: You've done enough, mercenary.
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: Surrender, and they might let you live.
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: No way. How many more years would I have to work?
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: Enough.
End this.
Were you the ones manipulating Allerdale?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: No, it's not you. The cowardly dukes wouldn't dare show their faces here.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Allerdale has failed. Alexandrina has the Sighs of Kings.
What a boring conclusion.
You know what?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: You will do.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: You will pay for all that you've done!
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Stop, traitor!
attributes.name: Tyrant

attributes.content: Nothing can stop me. You must pay for your crimes.
attributes.name: Knight

attributes.content: You will die with me!
attributes.name: Tyrant

attributes.content: The death of the flesh does not daunt me. Countless eyes will bear witness.
attributes.name: Knight

attributes.content: Brave children, you will carry the torch.
attributes.name: Knight

attributes.content: You will remember my virtues, and take this hard-earned peace into tomorrow.
attributes.name: Knight

attributes.content: The end.
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: That was wonderful, Lady Golding. A great success.
attributes.name: Molly

attributes.content: The product of a year of everyone's hard work.
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: I wish we were in more peaceful times. That way, Heidi could have been here to see it.
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: It's times like these that we need a play like this.
attributes.name: Molly

attributes.content: Look how happy the kids are—
attributes.name: Molly

attributes.content: Hey, Leo! Don't run with the props!
attributes.name: Molly

attributes.content: Get back here!
attributes.name: Naughty Child

attributes.content: Get back here!
attributes.name: Innocent Child

attributes.content: Run, run! I'll come for you! Great Victoria will come for you!
attributes.name: Naughty Child

attributes.content: Hie over the valleys and over the rivers, rumble-ye-rumble...
attributes.name: Naughty Child

attributes.content: Crush them! Squeeze the blood from them!
attributes.name: Naughty Child

attributes.content: Die! You'll all die! I'll catch you and kill you!
attributes.name: Naughty Child

attributes.content: Squeeze it out!
attributes.name: Innocent Child

attributes.content: Surrender, Sarkaz!
attributes.name: Naughty Child

attributes.content: Surrender!
attributes.name: Innocent Child

attributes.content: Or not, because I'll catch you!
attributes.name: Naughty Child

attributes.content: Stop! You're ruining Lady Golding's handmade 'steam armor'!
attributes.name: Molly

attributes.content: They...
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: Don't be angry, Lady Golding. They're just playing a game.
attributes.name: Molly

attributes.content: A game...?
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: Yes. The play has ended.
attributes.name: Molly

attributes.content: 'Squeeze the blood from them'?
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: It's... the Sarkaz...
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: She sees before her eyes the red that filled the bookstore.
She does not even have the strength to vomit.
It's normal.
attributes.name: Molly

attributes.content: We're in a war, after all.
attributes.name: Molly

attributes.content: The Sarkaz have been arresting people left and right, often in violent ways. The children see them, and emulate their behavior.
attributes.name: Molly

attributes.content: Do you know, Molly...?
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: Many remnants of Gaul harbor fear of the Steam Knights.
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: Those who were part of the war will never forget the sound of steam gushing outside their window that night.
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: But I had hoped that the Steam Knights would be more than just a weapon of death to the children.
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: I had hoped that there would be beautiful hope in their hearts when they play the Steam Knight.
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: I thought this was a war I could win.
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: Golding's gaze follows the children.
The foam-made steam armor falls to the ground. She tries to pick it up, but pulls back sharply, as though she's been burned.
I thought I was teaching the children...
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: Now, I realize that they were the ones teaching me a lesson.
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: This, here, is the ending. The true ending.
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: Before the wheels of time...
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: What we do may be utterly meaningless.
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: The lessons of the books are distant, blurred.
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: But no one can avoid being shaped by the times.
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: If they belong to blood, violence and war...
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: Then, our children will belong to blood, violence and war.
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: This is unavoidable.
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: What... what should I...
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: How could I dream of fighting it?
attributes.name: Golding
